mapper.select: SELECT T103.* FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R T101 INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R T102 ON ( T101.USER_GRP_ID = T102.REL_USER_GRP_ID AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_GRP_M T103 ON ( T102.USER_GRP_ID = T103.USER_GRP_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T103.PRIV_YN = 'Y' AND T103.USE_YN = 'Y' ) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N'

WITH GRP AS ( SELECT USER_GRP_ID, USER_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ), MENU_GRP AS ( /* 해당 사용자그룹의 그룹 가져오기 */ SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, T01.USER_GRP_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R T01 JOIN GRP T02 ON (T01.REL_USER_GRP_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID) /* ALL USER GROUP 가져오기 */ UNION ALL SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, USER_GRP_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R WHERE REL_USER_GRP_ID = 'ALL' /* 직접 사용자 메뉴 가져오기 */ UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'U' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, GRP.USER_ID AS ROLE_ID FROM GRP ), MENU_AUTH AS ( /* 할당된 메뉴별 권한 가져오기 */ SELECT T01.APP_ID AS APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, MAX(SUBSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, 1, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 1) - 1)) AS C_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 2) - INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 1) - 1)) AS R_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 2) + 1, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 3) - INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 2) - 1)) AS U_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 3) + 1, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 4) - INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 3) - 1)) AS D_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, INSTR (T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, ':', 1, 4) + 1)) AS E_AUTH FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R T01 JOIN MENU_GRP T02 ON (T01.PRIV_RCVR_GBN = T02.PRIV_RCVR_GBN AND T01.PRIV_RCVR_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID) GROUP BY T01.APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID ), MENU_AUTH_PATH AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID, T01.MENU_NM, LEVEL AS LEV, T04.C_AUTH, T04.R_AUTH, T04.U_AUTH, T04.D_AUTH, T04.E_AUTH, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T01.MENU_ID, '|'), 2) AS PATH FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_MENU_M T01 LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_AUTH T04 ON (T01.MENU_ID = T04.MENU_ID AND T01.APP_ID = T04.APP_ID) WHERE T01.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T01.USE_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR T01.UP_MENU_ID = T01.MENU_ID START WITH T04.MENU_ID IS NOT NULL ), ALL_MENU AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID, T01.UP_MENU_ID, T01.MENU_NM, LEVEL AS LEV, T01.MENU_TYPE, T01.PGM_ID, T03.PGM_NM, T03.SCREEN_ID, T03.PGM_TYPE, T03.INIT_SQL_STMT, T03.SUB_SQL_STMT, T03.USE_YN AS PGM_USE_YN, T01.ICON_CLASS, T01.SORT_NO, T01.USE_YN AS MENU_USE_YN, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(T01.MENU_ID, '|'), 2) AS PATH, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2) AS CONCAT_SORT_NO, NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2), '[^|]+', 1, 1), '000') AS SORT1, NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2), '[^|]+', 1, 2), '000') AS SORT2, NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2), '[^|]+', 1, 3), '000') AS SORT3, NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2), '[^|]+', 1, 4), '000') AS SORT4, NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(LPAD(T01.SORT_NO, 3, '0'), '|'), 2), '[^|]+', 1, 5), '000') AS SORT5 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_MENU_M T01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_PGM T03 ON (T01.PGM_ID = T03.PGM_ID) /* LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_AUTH T04 ON (T01.MENU_ID = T04.MENU_ID AND T01.APP_ID = T04.APP_ID) */ WHERE T01.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T01.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T01.APP_ID = 'BDP' CONNECT BY PRIOR T01.MENU_ID = T01.UP_MENU_ID START WITH T01.UP_MENU_ID IS NULL ) SELECT DISTINCT T01.MENU_ID AS "menuId", T01.MENU_NM AS "menuNm", T01.PGM_ID AS "pgmId", T01.UP_MENU_ID AS "upMenuId", T01.MENU_TYPE AS "menuType", T01.SORT_NO AS "sortNo", T01.SCREEN_ID AS "screenId", 'Y' AS MENU_VIEW_YN, T02.C_AUTH, T02.R_AUTH, T02.U_AUTH, T02.D_AUTH, T02.E_AUTH, T01.SORT1, T01.SORT2, T01.SORT3, T01.SORT4 FROM ALL_MENU T01 JOIN MENU_AUTH_PATH T02 ON (T01.APP_ID = T02.APP_ID AND T01.MENU_ID = T02.MENU_ID) ORDER BY T01.SORT1, T01.SORT2, T01.SORT3, T01.SORT4
